Event.Maindescription:
SIS Tamil New Year (Nanthana Varuda Pirappu) Celebrations

Events

Registration - 5:30 pm
Prayer Song - 6:00 pm
Panchanga Padalam
Variety entertainment
Vote of thanks
Dinner

Please RSVP by 19th April

As an incentive to encourage early confirmations and payments whilst simultaneously attempting to keep costs and food wastage down to the minimum, the entrance fee has been restructured as follows:

Reduced fee for Members Confirming & Paying in advance (by 19th April) : £7 (Preferred option)
Members at entrance: £10
Non members : £12
Children (between 5 and 10) : £4
